title: Ghost Story - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/18/20
itunes:title: Ghost Story - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/18/20
description:
Guest host Richard Syrett and an open lines caller explore his story of seeing the ghost of a little girl, then discovering later who she actually was.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
